edu.gcu.cst341.model

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gcu.cst341.model.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    iBankActions, iTrans
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checking, Loan, Saving

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements iBankActions, iTrans
    Superclass for creating Checking, Saving, and Loan accounts Future versions may declare this class abstract since it will not be instantiated

      • doTransaction

        public abstract void doTransaction(int transType,
                                   double amount)
        Leave abstract so the subclasses (Checking, Saving, Loan) can implement unique to those account types
        Specified by:
        doTransaction in interface iBankActions
        Parameters:
        transType - multiplier so doTransaction can process deposits and withdrawals (-1 for withdrawal or +1 for deposit)
        amount - the amount of the attempted transaction

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction(double amount,
                           java.lang.String transType)
        Implements the iTrans interface: addTransaction method Adds a transaction to the list of transactions and sets the lastTrans field
        Specified by:
        addTransaction in interface iTrans
        Parameters:
        amount - is the dollar amount of the transaction
        transType - is a description of the type of transaction
